items.title: Jollof Rice
items.description: Delicious Nigerian Jollof rice cooked with tomatoes, spices, and served with fried plantains and chicken.

items.title: Pounded Yam with Egusi
items.description: Smooth pounded yam served with rich and flavorful egusi soup, accompanied by assorted meats and fish.

items.title: Vegetable Salad
items.description: Fresh salad made with tomatoes, lettuce, cucumbers, and a touch of creamy dressing.
